item.description:
Lincoln Mar  12 (Sat)
2011

Dance
Dance Lesson   Fund Raiser for Shea High School, Studio One-suite 4102, 85 Industrial Circle, Lincoln, RI 02865-2611 Club, Large Wood Dance Floor, No Smoking
Admission $20, Doors Open 6:00PM to 11:00PM
This event will be a fund raiser for
the Shea High School team bound for
China. More information you may call
508-674-9703 Dance lesson 6:15pm
Event 7pm-11pm Info: (401) 728-5304
item.why: IF EVERYONE WHO GOES TO THE SLIPPERY SNEAKERS DANCE AT RISD ON THE 11 OF FEBURARY HERE IS ANOTHER CHANCE TO HEAR AND DANCE TO THIS MUSIC AND LET YOUR HAIR DOWN. INSTRUCTINS WILL BE GIVEN AND THE DANCE HALL IS HUGE.

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing
